meanings.definition: A floor or level of a building located below the main basement.
meanings.sent1: The subbasements of the old library were dark and musty.
meanings.sent2: We stored our old furniture in the subbasements of the house.
meanings.sent3: The subbasements were so deep that even the spiders needed flashlights.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts delved into the subbasements of her memories, searching for answers.
meanings.sent5: The subbasements echoed with the sound of dripping water, creating an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The lowest level of a building, typically used for storage or mechanical equipment.
meanings.sent1: The subbasements housed the building's heating system.
meanings.sent2: We found old documents and files in the subbasements of the office building.
meanings.sent3: The subbasements became a secret hideout for the neighborhood kids.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were buried deep in the subbasements of his heart, untouched for years.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the subbasements felt like descending into a forgotten world beneath the city.
